This absolutely stunning Bowlero Victorian/steam punk style jacket feels like so much more than a costume piece. The quality is incredibly high. The real feathers make it feel very authentic. This piece is elegant and eclectic, and truly creates a dazzling finish to most any costume. The seller description and photos are exactly what I received. The size is just right for me and I would highly recommend. Great value!

Beautifully made! My only complaint is some of the feathers falling off on the 1st day wearing it. I doubt the feathers would all stay put after washing as well. I would suggest handwashing. Wow  this is a beautiful jacket. It's very well made and the feathers are a beautiful black/green/blue. I read the other reviews and ordered a medium even though I usually wear a small. The neck is a bit loose but not terrible. The lace still stands up. The rest of the jacket fits perfectly. It's a very opulent addition to my costume wardrobe and I'm excited to wear it for my play.

评论概述: Well made, beautiful, just not quite big enough for me
评论详情: This was a gorgeous bolero perfect for a costume or any goth/alternative fashion. I returned this item because it was too tight in the shoulders and armpits. I wear between a 24/26 and this would probably be okay for 22/24 at its largest size.  It was very well made and the feathers were in perfect condiition though they need a little fluffing out of the package. The velvet was very warm so not suggested for summer or waem climates because it was very thick as well. The lace was very soft, but the seams inside the jacket were a bit scratchy. I would suggest lining it or wearing it over another top. The neck closure was actually totally fine for me even at my size and was fairly comfortable overall.

I’m 5’9, 155 lbs, 38DDD, wear a Medium shirt if I’m looking for a snug fit, a Large for a casual fit, my shoulders and arms aren’t particularly large.  I got an XL in this although I wanted to get a Large (out of stock). The large would have fit perfectly. The XL has a collar too big for my neck so it slumps and the sleeve openings are too large so it doesn’t touch my chest where it should.  I’ve considered keeping the XL but I don’t know if it’s worth keeping at this price for something that doesn’t fit that well.  Update: the smaller size came into stock before my event and I swapped them out. It did fit better around my neck but the arms were a little snug. It looked better on though so I went with the Large.

评论概述: Very nice quality, runs a little big.

There are a lot of small details that make this piece look really good up close. It did run a bit big for me. I'm 32-27-36, and this gaped both in the back and around the neck. The only part that fit well were the arms. It wasn't unwearable, but the gaping ruined the silhouette. So keep in mind that if you're small like me you might need to take it in.
